hero.title: Make your IT problems,
hero.text: With our IT outsourcing model by TOP teams from Latam. Focus on your business while we focus on your technology.

partners.title: Our developers and consultants are making software for
partners.subTitle: TOP companies in USA and Latam

aboutUs.title: About
aboutUs.text: We are the global software development consultant who develops and deploy most complex and high-profile projects

firstCard.title: Staff Augmentation
firstCard.text: Expert software engineers work together with your internal team on your projects. These engineers join your existing staff, often working remote until project completion.

secondCard.title: Dedicated Teams
secondCard.text: Presents talent which directly oversees the whole development project. This option provides a management structure with hands-on supervision of the workflow and tasks.

thirthCard.title: Project-Based Model
thirthCard.text: Your partner company oversees the entire development process: from establishing the specs, to allocating workflow, setting timescales and quality testing.

contact.title: Let's talk!
contact.text: Jump-start your business with expert software engineering teams.

form.name: Your name
form.confirmation: Thanks!. We will reply to you as soon as possible
